title: For sale 1897 Baltimore herald Boston cards

posts.post_title: For sale 1897 Baltimore herald Boston cards
posts.post_content:
I have for sale 5 of the 1897 Baltimore herald Boston cards/clippings 
Each are in excellent condition for their age and are tough to get. 

E.L Lake 30.00
E.M Lewis 40.00 
George Yeager 30.00
James Sullivan 30.00
J.E Stivette 40.00

Prices include shipping 

PayPal gift preferred 

Email me at [url]Michael.McGuffin@hotmail.com[/url] for pictures

Will consider trades for any damaged w600s

Pictures is one of the cards/clippings email me if you are interested in the others
These aren't cards they are newspaper clippings
I'm dropping these down to 20 dollars a clipping free postage PayPal gift preferred.  I can email pictures of other players if needed
